channel.title: TrueNAS on today is tomorrow's past
channel.description: Recent content in TrueNAS on today is tomorrow's past

item.title: Kicking Nextcloud Cron Script from TrueNAS Cron Job
item.description: Kicking Nextcloud Cron Script from TrueNAS Cron Job Tl;DR I’m running TrueCharts Nextcloud in my TrueNAS SCALE at home. After the setup, I discovered that none of the cron jobs was running. I’m using the Nextcloud News App and never saw any new stories. I didn’t find a way to make the Nextcloud cron work, so I decided to have a cron job that runs every hour to kick the Nextclodu cron job in the Nextcloud docker container.
